category.title: Trends
category.description: Strong trends of change: examples, data, reports.

category.title: Scenarios/Futures
category.description: Interesting scenarios or images of the future you've read/seen/heard/experienced.

category.title: Weak Signals
category.description: Emerging, evolving change...first cases, fresh ideas and paradigms...

category.title: Scenario Methods
category.description: How do we help people imagine and explore alternative possible futures? different approaches.

category.title: Visions of preferred futures
category.description: Stories, visuals, experiences, essays depicting preferred futures (NOT utopias).

category.title: Vision Methods
category.description: How do we help people and communities articulate their preferred futures? different methods.
